import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink as ReactLink, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavbarToggler, Collapse, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, NavbarText } from "reactstrap"; import { doLogout, getCurrentUserDetail, isLoggedIn } from "../auth"; const CustomNavbar = () => { let navigate = useNavigate() const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const [login, setLogin] = useState(false) const [user, setUser] = useState(undefined) useEffect(() => { setLogin(isLoggedIn()) setUser(getCurrentUserDetail()) }, [login]) const logout = () => { doLogout(() => { //logged out setLogin(false) navigate("/") }) } return (
MyBlogs setIsOpen(!isOpen)} />
New Feed About Services More Contact Us Facebook Youtube Instagram LinkedIn
{ login && ( <> Profile Info {user.email} Logout ) } { !login && ( <> Login Signup ) }
) } export default CustomNavbar;
